Research Topic: Porous Media Modeling of Two-phase Micro-channel Cooling of Electronic Chips with Non-uniform Power Distribution. 
- Provide a porous media thermal modeling method to simulate the two phase micro-channel cooling of an electronic chip with non-uniform power distribution. 
- Include flow regimes of single phase, subcooled boiling, slug/annular boiling within the micro-channels. 
- A full scale electronic chip is modeled with realistic power distribution on the surface. The computing cost of this modeling method is low and it can predict the temperature distribution with acceptable accuracy. 
Publication: 2013 IMECE Conference
